title: 3MCT: Best Places to Drink
description: Katie finally traveled for the first time in a year and well…it’s off to a rocky start. Plus, Christina's boyfriend is no longer smelly. And, this week’s bracket is best places to have a drink. Any complaints with it, take it up with the Sports? Union.
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: This week's bracket is best places to drink
